mapper.sql: id, journey_id, name, remark, sort, created_at, updated_at, creator, editor, deleted_at, ext_corp_id
mapper.select: select j.id, j.journey_id, j.name, j.remark, j.sort, COUNT(c.id) customer_num from br_journey_stage j join br_journey_stage_customer c on j.ext_corp_id = c.ext_corp_id and j.id = c.journey_stage_id and c.deleted_at is null join wx_customer wc on wc.ext_id = c.customer_ext_id and wc.has_delete is not null where j.deleted_at is null and j.journey_id = #{journeyId} and j.ext_corp_id = #{extCorpId} group by j.id order by j.sort
